### Kevin O'Brien

<h4> About Me </h4>

- Agricultural Data Scientist based between the West of Ireland and London (UK)
  
- <a href= "www.whyr.pl">Why R? Foundation</a> - Community Team lead & Webinars co-ordinator (on hiatus)

- <a href= "www.Python.ie">Python Ireland</a> - Company Director and PyCon Ireland Conference Lead

- <a href= "www.JuliaCon.Org">JuliaCon 2022</a> - Social Media Chair

- Was previously a Teaching Fellow lecturer and (what is now known) a "Research Software Engineer" in a University.


### Why R? Foundation

<h4>Why R? Foundation </h4> 

* The Why R? webinar series took place between April 2020? And May 2021. In totla, there were more than 50 webinars encompassing a wide variety of topics relation to the R programming language. 

* In addition to the webinar series, there were two online conferences that took place in December 2020 and December 2021.
